remarks: The second projection functor is a functor onto the right argument. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
1stfcl.t $e |- T = ( C Xc. D ) $.
1stfcl.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
1stfcl.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
2ndfcl.p $e |- Q = ( C 2ndF D ) $.
2ndfcl $p |- ( ph -> Q e. ( T Func D ) ) $.
